name: MKOverlay
desc: An interface for associating content with a specific map region.

items.name: var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The approximate center point of the overlay area.

items.name: var boundingMapRect: MKMapRect
items.desc: The projected rectangle that encompasses the overlay.

items.name: func intersects(MKMapRect) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the specified rectangle intersects the receiverâ€™s shape.

items.name: func canReplaceMapContent() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the overlay content replaces the underlying map content.
